resources.string: In nowadays rapidly developing world where multitasking is essential for productive activities, our hard-working team would like to present you with the ultimate solution to track your educational progress most effectively. This planner app is honored to keep an eye on your courses, lessons and deadlines and reminding you periodically. Our goal is to relieve stress in the educational life of students around the world.
We do not track you, as well as we do not profile you. We value your privacy ;)
Welcome to the RS:Study guide! Here we will introduce you to the basic functions of the application and how to use them.
First, customize your account by clicking the gear button in the right upper corner.
By clicking the avatar button in the upper left corner, you can see the updated profile and add a profile picture.
What’s more, we have a dark theme, that you can turn on in the same section.
Now to the essentials - adding a course.
You can do this from the main menu by clicking this button.
After that give your course a name and number of lessons per week.
Add date, duration, and repetitions for each lesson.
